Hi all!

My team and I are performing a large crawl and we are using a Bloo=
m filter to keep track of the already visited nodes. One thing we didn't ex=
pect was that the filter keeps track of the URIs of the DNS protocol, am I =
right?

So we were expecting something on the order of 900 million nodes an=
d, after having crawled 400 millions we found out that our frontier, summin=
g up already downloaded and queued ones, contained more than a billion node=
s! So now the false positive probability is falling.

Is there a way to pre=
vent DNS URIs from being stored in the Bloom filter?

Thank you very much
M=
atteo
